body: Hi Mostapha, Chris and group members, If I want to custom a mass opaque material, is it possible to set up with R value? The help of **Honeybee_EnergyPlus Nomass Opaque Material** writes,  "However, this component is very useful if you only have an R-value for a material (or a construction) and you know that the mass is relatively small. _ If you want to create a material that accounts for mass, you should use the "Honeybee_EnergyPlus Window Material" component". [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*R7YIBaka1tADy23ogDHrwvaqWCunrPOBoFSFYtaWlM0kInnt5Dj8gAwUCp-Tk-O17YceU3XvA6*SDkT7ZrlNFwiuU65lsqc/QQ2016110802x.png) Is it possible, or my misunderstand? Thank you in advance.
topic: Custom Mass Opaque Material with R Value

replies.body:
Are you trying to add a mass to the zone or set up the construction for one of the zones faces (e.g. wall, roof, floor)?



For the first one you can use "Honeybee_Add Internal Mass to Zone" and for the second one use "Honeybee_EnergyPlus Opaque Material".
